org.eclipse.jetty.http

Interface HttpBuffers

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConnector, AbstractNIOConnector, Ajp13SocketConnector, BlockingChannelConnector, HttpBuffersImpl, HttpClient, InheritedChannelConnector, LocalConnector, NestedConnector, NetworkTrafficSelectChannelConnector, SelectChannelConnector, SocketConnector, SslSelectChannelConnector, SslSocketConnector

    public interface HttpBuffers
    Abstract Buffer pool.
